description:
Notorious lecher Ataru Moroboshi has to save the world from aliens before learning what happens when you skip out on intergalactic cab fare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Lum the Notorious! - It`s Raining Oil in Our Town
Il personaggio di un`altra galassia - Lamù deve tornare sulla terra
Les envahisseurs / Il pleut du pétrole sur la ville
Uwasa no Lum-chan Datcha! - Machi ni Sekiyu no Ame ga Furu
うわさのラムちゃん だっちゃ! - 町に石油の 雨がふる
